title: Blockchain powered banking
description: There are more than 1.7 billion adults that are unbanked worldwide. Africa accounts for 17 percent of this figure.
solution: Ennarea will serve as a blockchain-powered bank for most unbanked Africans by making its service accessible through a mobile platform.
experience: We have developed and tested a cryptocurrency exchange platform that can be accessed on Android, iPhone, and web browesr.
